resources.string: Are you having a great day?
I think the dinner tonight should be Tonkatsu!
Wait, who is picking up Mika today?
Chus, chus, chus from Yo chan & Mi chan.
You deserves an ice cold beer tonight.
You and your family should smoke something soon.
I am just a phone, but my mom drives me CRAZY!!
What time is the dinner tonight?
